channel.title: Matrix how to edit player rights (to a donator and yea)
channel.description:
How do you edit player rights and other player stuff on this:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/458896-matrix-718-742-cache-includes-new-maps-more-reuploaded.html

item.title: Matrix how to edit player rights (to a donator and yea)
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

It doesn’t matter if you’re using a 718/742 cache, it’s still a 718 source.

Player rights:

Open Players.java and paste this somewhere,

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("INSERT_NAME")) { rights = NUMBER; }

Change “NUMBER” to whatever you want (1, 2 etc…)
Change “INSERT_NAME” to your name.

Read full topic
item.source: Matrix how to edit player rights (to a donator and yea)
